main.summary: Describes the cryptographic identity used to encrypt a DataItem.

field.name: publickey
field.summary: The public key (Base64-encoded) used for encryption.

field.name: serial
field.summary: The serial number of the certificate used for encryption.

field.name: thumbprint
field.summary: The thumbprint of the certificate used for encryption.

property.name: PublicKey
property.summary: Gets or sets the Base64-encoded public key used for encryption.

property.name: Serial
property.summary: Gets or sets the serial number of the certificate used for encryption.

property.name: ThumbPrint
property.summary: Gets or sets the thumbprint of the certificate used for encryption.

method.name: Clone
method.returns: A new DataEncryptInfo instance with identical values.

constructor.name: Constructor
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataEncryptInfo class with the specified public key, serial number, and thumbprint.
constructor.param: The Base64-encoded public key used for encryption.
The serial number of the certificate used for encryption.
The thumbprint of the certificate used for encryption.

constructor.name: ConstructorCertificate
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataEncryptInfo class from an X509Certificate2, extracting the public key, serial number, and thumbprint.
constructor.param: The certificate to extract information from.

constructor.name: ConstructorKey
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataEncryptInfo class from a ManagementKey, deserializing the certificate and extracting the public key, serial number, and thumbprint.
constructor.param: The management key containing the certificate.
